name: Sirimavo Bandaranaike
description: World's first female Prime Minister who led Sri Lanka through significant social and economic reforms while championing non-aligned movement
philosophy: A nation's strength ultimately consists in what it can do on its own, and not in what it can borrow from others.
quotes: The true test of a nation's standing is how well it can defend its agriculture and feed its people
Politics is not a game for the weak-hearted
